00035 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00036 Interpolator::Interpolator()
00037 {
00038     // we don't have to do anything
00039 }
00040 
00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00042 void Interpolator::addEntry(m_time_type time, m_value_type value)
00043 {
00044     //Create a new entry:
00045     InterpolatorEntry ie(time,value);
00046     //add the entry to this collection
00047     add(ie);
00048 }
00049 
00050 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00051 void Interpolator::scale(m_value_type scale)
00052 {
00053     // iterate through this collection:
00054     Iterator<InterpolatorEntry> it = iterator();
00055     while (it.hasNext())
00056     {
00057         it.next().value_ *= scale;
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00063 m_value_type Interpolator::getMaxValue()
00064 {
00065     Iterator<InterpolatorEntry> it = iterator();
00066     
00067     m_value_type val = 0.0;
00068     m_value_type maxVal = 0.0;
00069     while (it.hasNext())
00070     {
00071         val = it.next().value_;
00072         if (val > maxVal) maxVal = val;
00073     }
00074     
00075     return maxVal;
00076 }

00078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00079 void Interpolator::xml_print( ofstream& xmlOutput )
00080 {
00081         DynamicVariable* pnt2dyn = this;
00082 
00083         xmlOutput << "<dv id=\"" << (long)pnt2dyn << "\">" << endl;
00084         xmlOutput << "\t<dv_type value=\"interp\" />" << endl;
00085         xmlOutput << "\t<interp_type value=\"" << getType() << "\" />" << endl;
00086         xmlOutput << "\t<duration value=\"" << getDuration() << "\" />" << endl;
00087         xmlOutput << "\t<rate value=\"" << getSamplingRate() << "\" />" << endl;
00088 
00089         //Print out private vars and collections for Interpolator here
00090         InterpolatorEntry myent(0,0);
00091         Iterator<InterpolatorEntry> it = iterator();
00092         while(it.hasNext())
00093         {
00094                 myent = it.next();
00095                 xmlOutput << "\t<entry time=\"" << myent.time_ << "\" ";
00096                 xmlOutput << "value=\"" << myent.value_ << "\" />" << endl;
00097         }
00098 
00099         xmlOutput << "</dv>" << endl;
00100 }

00103 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00104 void Interpolator::xml_print( ofstream& xmlOutput, list<DynamicVariable*>& dynObjs )
00105 {
00106 
00107         DynamicVariable* pnt2dyn = this;
00108 
00109         //Print the pointer value as an ID, then the "meat" gets printed later
00110         xmlOutput << "\t\t\t\t<dv_type value=\"interp\" />" << endl;
00111         xmlOutput << "\t\t\t\t<dv_ptr id=\"" << (long)pnt2dyn << "\" />" << endl;
00112 
00113         // Update dynamic variable list if necessary
00114         list<DynamicVariable*>::const_iterator dynit;
00115         for( dynit=dynObjs.begin(); dynit != dynObjs.end(); dynit++ )
00116         {
00117                 if( (*dynit) == this )
00118                         break;
00119         }
00120         if( dynit == dynObjs.end() ){
00121                 dynObjs.push_back( this );
00122         }
00123 
00124 }
00125 
00126 void Interpolator::xml_read(XmlReader::xmltag* envtag)
00127 {
00128         char* value=NULL;
00129         XmlReader::xmltag *entrytag;
00130         
00131         if(value=envtag->findChildParamValue("duration","value"))
00132         {
00133                 setDuration(atof(value));
00134         }
00135         
00136         if(value=envtag->findChildParamValue("rate","value"))
00137         {
00138                 setSamplingRate(atoi(value));
00139         }
00140         
00141         while(entrytag=envtag->children->find("entry"))
00142         {
00143                 float time = 0.0;
00144                 float val = 0.0;
00145                 if(value=entrytag->getParamValue("time"))
00146                 {
00147                         time = atof(value);
00148                 }
00149                 if(value=entrytag->getParamValue("value"))
00150                 {
00151                         val = atof(value);
00152                 }
00153                 InterpolatorEntry ie(time,val);
00154                 //add the entry to this collection
00155                 add(ie);
00156         }
00157 }
